definition: to submerge/to immerse/to sink/to keep down/to lower/to drop/deep/profound/heavy

sentences.english: This process of longshore transport is responsible for moving sediment up and down coastlines.
sentences.chinese: 在沿岸運輸的過程中，沉澱物在海岸線上下移動。

sentences.english: As the wine was often full of sediment, a poison could be easily slipped into it.
sentences.chinese: 紅酒中有許多沉澱物，很容易被下毒。

sentences.english: She scooped out the yeasty sediments.
sentences.chinese: 她將發酵的沉澱物舀了出來。

sentences.english: As smoke is breathed in, all those components form deposits on the membranes of the lungs.
sentences.chinese: 當煙被吸入時，所有這些成分形成肺膜上的沉澱物。

sentences.english: Forsteritic olivine almost invariably represents primary precipitate material .
sentences.chinese: 鎂質橄欖石几乎總是代表了原生沉澱物。

sentences.english: Thoroughly clean threaded end to remove any harmful steel or iron deposits.
sentences.chinese: 徹底清洗管線末端，清除任何有害的鋼或鐵沉澱物。

sentences.english: Fouling also refers to the accumulation of normally inorganic deposits on heat exchanger tubing.
sentences.chinese: 污垢也指熱交換器管子上積累的無機物沉澱物。

sentences.english: While vessel is in provided in front of fuel oil purifier for preventing sludge flowing to the reservoir around.
sentences.chinese: 燃油分油機前應安裝圍板防止沉澱物流到附近的水箱。

sentences.english: Then abruptly the sediment turned black.
sentences.chinese: 後面的沉澱物突然變黑。

sentences.english: There is some deposit in the bottom of the flask.
sentences.chinese: 這隻燒杯的底部有些沉澱物。

sentences.english: Prior to reassembly flush valve to remove sediment.
sentences.chinese: 在重新組裝沖洗閥之前，先清除沉澱物。

sentences.english: Why are sediments always found in my electric kettle?
sentences.chinese: 爲甚麼電熱水壼經常有一些沉澱物？
